description: An uncharted island inhabited only by an elderly man named Zenny and numerous goats. The island features a mysterious pirate ship hidden in the mountains and is surrounded by dangerous fog and rocky waters.

keyEvents.title: Discovery of Goat Island
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hat Pirates discover Goat Island after escaping through fog while being pursued by Marines.

keyEvents.title: Meeting Zenny
keyEvents.description: The crew encounters Zenny, the island's only human inhabitant, who commands the island's goats.

keyEvents.title: Discovery of the Mountain Pirate Ship
keyEvents.description: Zoro discovers a mysterious pirate ship hidden in the mountains of Goat Island.

notableLocations.name: Mountain Pirate Ship
notableLocations.description: A mysterious pirate ship found in the mountains, hinting at Zenny's past and the island's history.

notableLocations.name: Zenny's Residence
notableLocations.description: Where Zenny lives on the island among the goats.

statusHistory.description: Island inhabited by Zenny and numerous goats

culturalSignificance: Non-canon filler location where the Straw Hats help an elderly man fulfill his dream of becoming a pirate.
